Package org.codemonkey.util

Provides functional neutral utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DatagramDecoder Interface for marking objects as datagram decoders.
DatagramEncoder Interface for marking objects encodable as datagram.
Executable<Controller,ExecutionException extends RuntimeException> Marks an object executable.
SimpleSerialization<T> Guarantees an object can produce and populate itself with a string value, not unlike deserialization.
 

Class Summary
DecoderUtil Helper utility for interpreting encoded strings, including complete reflective decoding of objects.
EncoderUtil Helper utility for encoding (integers, strings etc.
 

Package org.codemonkey.util Description

Provides functional neutral utility classes.

Provides the Executable interface used to enable direct execution of decoded client request objects (making them function as Command objects).

Provides the DatagramEncoder and DatagramDecoder interfaces used to custom serialize message to and from the server.

In addition, provides utility classes that help automate encoding/decoding using Java reflection.

Since:
1.0
